DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Tissue Processor Device Component Manufacturer Recommendation Maintenance Provided Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication as to whether the equipment was maintained following the manufacturer's recommendations.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Tissue Processor Device Component Manufacturer Recommendation Maintenance Provide
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._A device designed for preparing or treating a material; also the part of a computer that makes most of the calculations._A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._Advice telling someone what the best thing to do is._The act of sustaining something in its current form or proper condition; upkeep._Supply what is desired or needed.
